pages.body:
# List of Zites

1. Services
2. Search Engines
3. Blogs
4. Media
5. Discussion
6. Politics
7. Porn

## 1. Services

[Nullpaste](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz/) Pastebin for [[ZeroNet]]

[ZeroMail](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Mail.ZeroNetwork.bit/) Email over ZeroNet

[ZeroProxies](http://127.0.0.1:43110/14y3fN1A214HYdKe5f6WnQdfT3PdKLSAJo/) Public ZeroNet proxies

[ZeroID](http://127.0.0.1:43110/zeroid.bit/) Decentralized user authentication

## 2. Search Engines

[Kaffiene](http://127.0.0.1:43110/search.kaffie.bit/)

[ZeroSearch](http://127.0.0.1:43110/zerosearch.bit)

[Bwoi](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1f7FYxZWSZ5YG7Nd8sGsHcWEQgvdnVvQF/)

[CensoredSearch](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LC3ryygCrv94ZK4Nk8ELW6vE1hKwopE8T/)

## 3. Blogs

[ZeroBlogs](http://127.0.0.1:43110/12WY4MGfJDjuBjj692q9x4TH8S5fsfaMtm/) Blog Lists

[ZeroNet Dev Blog](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit)

## 4. Media

[Play Torrents](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1PLAYgDQboKojowD3kwdb3CtWmWaokXvfp/)

[Microsoft MSDN Software](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1AJB5rtjfB9imjDGVk5vtRtZp3zgYizbpG/) Uses Mega links

## 5. Discussion

[Zerotalk](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/) Similar to Reddit

[ZeroBoard](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Board.ZeroNetwork.bit/) Very basic microblogging

[0rc](http://127.0.0.1:43110/main.0rc.bit)  A WIP replacement for Slack/IRC

## 6. Politics

[CensoredSearch](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LC3ryygCrv94ZK4Nk8ELW6vE1hKwopE8T/)

## 7. Porn

[PORN.0chan](http://127.0.0.1:43110/18y7YzbegRnUXMovnYtmFfndSpd1paEVRr/) Legal porn imageboard

[Pix Image Albums](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0pix.bit/) Trigger warning: non-nude jailbait section. Uses optional files?

[0chan Porn](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1NZNtZQZHQRJXafvJpmY5jgqwRaCEZMsUc/) Imageboard using optional files, users only download what they request
